title: hariyanu vaani
sahitya:
haryanu vAni sari evvarE hariyanu vAni sari evvarE



caraNam 1



paluvidhamula talapulu rOsi nilavaramagu bhaktiyu jEsi malayani mata bhEdamu

gOsi



caraNam 2



karagucu madilO gAminci hari caraNamulanu hrdayamu nunci varashukhamukha

dhanamani Enci



caraNam 3



I sukha merugani jana celimi vAsuki visamE marikolimi nija dAsula sambhASaNa

balimi



caraNam 4



nI japamuna hrdayamu vEga rAjillanu jEsina tygarAja nutuni pErula bAga
